long_description: Enjoy classic aviator-style shades but afraid of smashing them on your global tour? Fear not. The Smith Soundcheck polarized sunglasses are bold and strong enough to endure life on the road. Polarized lenses reduce 99% of visible glare for increased sharpness and decreased eye fatigue. Lightweight and virtually shatterproof, injection-molded polycarbonate lenses are twenty times more impact resistant than glass and one-third the weight. Gray-tint lenses are ideal for bright days and direct sunlight. Grilamid(R) TR90 lightweight nylon frames offer a consistent fit and flexibility in all temperatures and are extremely impact resistant. Hydrophilic Megol nose pads become tackier when wet for reliable grip during exercise and hot weather.
short_description: Enjoy classic aviator-style shades but afraid of smashing them on your global tour? Fear not. The Smith Soundcheck polarized sunglasses are bold and strong enough to endure life on the road.
